name: MTLSamplerDescriptor
desc: An object that you use to configure a texture sampler.

items.name: normalizedCoordinates
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether texture coordinates are normalized to the range [0.0, 1.0].

items.name: rAddressMode
items.desc: The address mode for the texture depth (r) coordinate.

items.name: sAddressMode
items.desc: The address mode for the texture width (s) coordinate.

items.name: tAddressMode
items.desc: The address mode for the texture height (t) coordinate.

items.name: borderColor
items.desc: The border color for clamped texture values.

items.name: MTLSamplerAddressMode
items.desc: Modes that determine the texture coordinate at each pixel when a fetch falls outside the bounds of a texture.

items.name: MTLSamplerBorderColor
items.desc: Values that determine the border color for clamped texture values when the sampler address mode is MTLSamplerAddressMode.clampToBorderColor.

items.name: minFilter
items.desc: The filtering option for combining pixels within one mipmap level when the sample footprint is larger than a pixel (minification).

items.name: magFilter
items.desc: The filtering operation for combining pixels within one mipmap level when the sample footprint is smaller than a pixel (magnification).

items.name: mipFilter
items.desc: The filtering option for combining pixels between two mipmap levels.

items.name: lodMinClamp
items.desc: The minimum level of detail (LOD) to use when sampling from a texture.

items.name: lodMaxClamp
items.desc: The maximum level of detail (LOD) to use when sampling from a texture.

items.name: lodAverage
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the GPU can use an average level of detail (LOD) when sampling from a texture.

items.name: maxAnisotropy
items.desc: The number of samples that can be taken to improve the quality of sample footprints that are anisotropic.

items.name: MTLSamplerMinMagFilter
items.desc: Filtering options for determining which pixel value is returned within a mipmap level.

items.name: MTLSamplerMipFilter
items.desc: Filtering options for determining what pixel value is returned with multiple mipmap levels.

items.name: compareFunction
items.desc: The sampler comparison function used when performing a sample compare operation on a depth texture.

items.name: MTLCompareFunction
items.desc: Options used to specify how a sample compare operation should be performed on a depth texture.

items.name: supportArgumentBuffers
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the sampler can be encoded into an argument buffer.

items.name: label
items.desc: A string that identifies the sampler.
